title: 238. The United States of Cory Booker
description: The junior U.S. Senator from New Jersey thinks bipartisanship is right around the corner. Is he just an idealistic newbie or does he see a way forward that everyone else has missed?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
